Commodity Analyzer

Package commodities.event

Interface Summary
ContractListener The ContractListener is an EventListener that listens for contracts.
ContractSelectionListener The ContractSelectionListener is an EventListener that listens for contracts to be selected.
GraphRedrawListener The GraphRedrawListener is an EventListener that controls the drawing of graphs.
PriceDisplayListener The PriceDisplayListener is an EventListener that listens for changing prices to display.
PriceListener The PriceListener is an EventListener that listens for the individual price information to change.
 

Class Summary
ContractEvent ContractEvent indicates that a new contract was added to the system.
ContractSelectionEvent ContractSelectionEvent indicates that the selected contract has changed.
GraphRedrawEvent A GraphRedrawEvent indicates that a graph needs to be redrawn and gives the parameters in which to draw that graph.
PriceDisplayEvent PriceDisplayEvent indicates that the price to display has changed.
PriceEvent PriceEvent indicates that the current price has changed.
